Two-way frequency table

Source: R/crosstab.R
crosstab.Rd

This function creates a two way frequency table.

crosstab(
  data,
  rowvar,
  colvar,
  type = c("freq", "cellpercent", "rowpercent", "colpercent"),
  total = TRUE,
  na.rm = TRUE,
  digits = 2,
  plot = FALSE
)

Arguments

data

data frame
rowvar

row factor (unquoted)
colvar

column factor (unquoted)
type

statistics to print. Options are "freq", "cellpercent", "rowpercent", or "colpercent" for frequencies, cell percents, row percents, or column percents). Default: "freq".
total

if TRUE, includes total percents, Default: TRUE
na.rm

if TRUE, deletes cases with missing values, Default: TRUE
digits

number of decimal digits to report for percents, Default: 2
plot

logical. If TRUE generate stacked bar chart. Default: FALSE.

Value

a list with 9 components:

  • tbl (table). Table of frequencies

  • cellPcts (table). Table of cell percents

  • rowPcts (table). Table of row percents

  • colPcts (table). Table of column percents

  • type (character). Type of table to print

  • total (logical). If TRUE, print row and or column totals

  • digits (numeric). number of digits to print

  • rowname (character). Row variable name

  • colname (character). Column variable name

Details

This function calculates and prints a two way frequency table. Given a data frame, a row factor, a column factor, and a type (frequencies, cell percents, row percents, or column percents) the function prints a table with labeled rows and columns, frequencies or percents with the percentage sign depending on type, a level labeled <NA> if na.rm = FALSE, and a level labeled Total if total = TRUE.

Examples

crosstab(mtcars, cyl, gear)

#>        gear
#> cyl      3  4  5 Total
#>   4      1  8  2    11
#>   6      2  4  1     7
#>   8     12  0  2    14
#>   Total 15 12  5    32

crosstab(mtcars, cyl, gear, type="cellpercent")

#>        gear
#> cyl           3       4       5   Total
#>   4       3.12%  25.00%   6.25%  34.38%
#>   6       6.25%  12.50%   3.12%  21.88%
#>   8      37.50%   0.00%   6.25%  43.75%
#>   Total  46.88%  37.50%  15.62% 100.00%

crosstab(mtcars, cyl, gear, type="colpercent")

#>        gear
#> cyl           3       4       5
#>   4       6.67%  66.67%  40.00%
#>   6      13.33%  33.33%  20.00%
#>   8      80.00%   0.00%  40.00%
#>   Total 100.00% 100.00% 100.00%

crosstab(mtcars, cyl, gear, type="rowpercent")

#>    gear
#> cyl       3       4       5   Total
#>   4   9.09%  72.73%  18.18% 100.00%
#>   6  28.57%  57.14%  14.29% 100.00%
#>   8  85.71%   0.00%  14.29% 100.00%
